entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor.platform.readStringField not working anymore after dotnet 7.0 upgrade #78731
  • [NativeAOT] Signalless Hijack #78724
    Future
  • [Crossgen2] Fix RVA field access in composite mode #78723
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IndexOfAnyValues<T>.Contains(T) #78722
  • FileNameStar_NeedsEncoding_EncodedAndDecodedCorrectly test is failing in CI #78718
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Numerics.Vectors test fails to compile with an assert. #78717
    8.0.0
  • [Android] SSLStream throws 'Handshake has already been started' on API level 26 #78716
    8.0.0
  • [Android] Investigate support for SSLStream below API Level 24 #78715
    8.0.0
  • JIT: RBO still introduces data races #78713
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide APIs to create JsonPropertyInfo based on PropertyInfo #78711
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm TimeZoneInfo.Local.GetUtcOffset is returning 7:53:00 in PST zone #78721
  • [wasm] consider bumping devDependencies #78708
  • Enable baseline validation for packages introduced in .NET 7 #78705
    8.0.0
  • Review usage of nullable suppressions (especially `!`) in CodeExporter.cs #78704
    8.0.0
  • Generics implementations with nullable of non struct don't match type #78699
  • TarEntry: link target path checks #78695
  • The performance of java is almost twice that of C# #78691
  • WebAssembly.Sdk - Unsuppressable warnings #78690
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Change Console Startup Messages #78689
  • HTTPS performance degradation in HttpClient after .NET 7 migration #78686
  • DataTable, the result of the `new` operator is checked for `null` #78684
  • Allow modeling ref fields in the class constructor interpreter #78681
    Future
  • Aggressive GC: No Memory Decommit until 2nd GC (LOH only?) #78679
  • Add trimming analysis tools #78671
    8.0.0

Closed

  • TypeLoadException in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml v7.0.0.0 for EncryptedData in .NET 4.8 project referencing .NET Standard 2.0 library #78652
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/0099/AboveStackLimit/AboveStackLimit.sh #78622
  • Attribute.CoreCLR, redundant check #78683
  • Exception from System.ServiceModel in Net 6 or 7 #78694
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/nullabletypes/isinst_do/isinst_do.sh #78623
  • how can we trim dll unused? #78633
  • Simplify Microsoft.Win32.Registry sources split #77974
    Future
  • OOB Library's AssemblyVersion is inconsistent between ref and src assemblies in servicing #63467
    6.0.x
  • Polymorphic deserialization requires disriminator property order to be first in json. #78338
  • Calling GetType on resource from loaded assembly returns type from currently executing runtime version, not the assembly target runtime version #78436
  • Generic math WriteLittleEndian is slow #78662
  • Feature suggestion - Obfuscator #78687
  • [API Proposal]: Add CutAll method #78324
  • Unable to build: Unable to load Analyzer assembly #77723
  • NativeAOT ignores PdbFile compiler option #78337
  • [mono] Hot Reload: support adding instance fields #63643
    8.0.0
  • [pgo] Assert failure: (pCtx->Pc < codestart) || (pCtx->Pc >= codeend) #77156
    8.0.0
  • [pgo] windows arm/arm64 test jobs almost always timeout #77155
    8.0.0
  • JSMarshalerType, a value is checked for equality to `MarshalerType.Single` twice #78682
    8.0.0
  • Using json source generators prevents the possibility to serialize anonymous objects in views #78164
  • Performance Benchmark #78451
  • Serious flaw that I believe can be exploited by people with no good intentions... #78639
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException or JsonException reading json file greater than 16KB on .net7.0 but not on .net6.0 #78692
  • dotnet.create() does not throw error when WebAssembly.instantiateStreaming() fails #77882
  • [wasm] Clean up environment helpers duplicated from emscripten #74423
    8.0.0
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector256.Program.MultiplyAddSingle fails in consolidated Vector test on OSX #78079
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in ilconformance jmp #78579
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT compiler assert on static abstract GVM #78116
  • RuntimeType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() performance issue #73860
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT exports marked functions for exe apps. #78738
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey and List copy to Array #78737
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Allow inlining for ldsfld + value-type #78736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Explicitly omit RID from crossgen2 binary path #78735
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix netfx build for S.S.C.Xml nuget package #78734
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Explicitly omit RID from crossgen2 binary path #78733
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Disable AOTing methods which contain catch clauses insid… #78732
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Don't bind against non-shipping contract assemblies #78730
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Change MetricSpec.TryParse to be Parse #78729
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary % in ToFourDigitYear #78728
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Fix some duplicative null checks #78727
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm] bump devDependencies to rollup 3 and TypeScript 4.9 #78726
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove unnecessary null check in DataTable #78725
    area-System.Data
  • Update NugetPackagingVersion to 6.2.2 #78720
  • [release/7.0] Update a few dependencies #78710
  • JIT: Set GTF_ORDER_SIDEEFF for some nodes with invisible dependencies #78698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable a test after 78358 is fixed. #78697
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm] Use "node:crypto" to polyfill getRandomValues on older node #78696
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Place frozen objects into dehydrated section #78688
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter to support calling `string::Length` #78680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2051445 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [6.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78670
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78669
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Fix netfx build for S.S.C.Xml nuget package #78665
    area-System.Security
  • Add readmes for System.Security* and related libraries #78674
    area-System.Security
  • Delete redundant check #78702
    area-System.Runtime
  • [mono][wasm] Disable AOTing methods which contain catch clauses insid… #78653
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Teach internal `printf` about 'z' #78685
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove TrimStart in PAX extended attributes #78707
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Clean-up `Microsoft.Win32.Registry` and remove the non-Windows code. #77996
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Clarify System.Diagnostics.Process' README #78719
    area-Meta
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in CoreLib #78678
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Clean up members/signatures/visibility in deps_format/resolver #78572
    area-Host
  • Cleanup GenFacades logic and don't bind against non-shipping contract assemblies #78703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in System.Net.Http #78660
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Introduce System.IO.Hashing and System.DateTime area labels #78673
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for System.IO.Compression* #78645
    documentation, area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.0
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • Reduce private points of contact between frozen collections and ImmutableArray<T>. #78675
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Performance improvements to vectorized Span.Reverse #78650
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Regex.Escape #78667
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] fix duplicate check #78693
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] propagate aborted startup to top most promise #78644
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] clean duplicated environment helpers #78643
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix FMA tests to use Math.FusedMultiplyAdd for fallback #78672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a shared apicompat suppression file for CoreLib #78654
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use IndexOfAnyInRange in StripBidiControlCharacters #78658
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Fix the other jmp.il after #78501 (more for #78579) #78656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in X500NameEncoder #78676
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Cache GenericTypeDefinition to improve perf #78288
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, community-contribution

Updated

  • [wasm] More jiterpreter cleanup #78519
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Keep FieldSeq in AssertionDesc #78616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fix to move to using GC pal within coreclr on Linux #78521
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix commit accounting for large pages #78564
    area-GC-coreclr
  • fix DualMode ReceiveFrom on macOS #78261
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Improve controlling which scenarios test libraries should be run against #78495
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Improviments in debugging in async methods #78651
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Uri #78666
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • avoid allocations in SendTo and Quic #78591
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Anonymous pipe resource leak when DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle is not called #78562
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78004
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • WIP: Poof of concept port of interleave feature #78374
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Correctly handle false on Add/Take from underlying collection in BlockingCollection #77936
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Xml #78664
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][libs] Documentation: How to debug library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Removed range checks have ordered side effects (#78554) #78561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #78426
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.x
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
